Add VI Hierarchy Dialog Box

Requires: Base Development System

From the front panel or block diagram window of a VI, select File»Print, select the Multiple VIs option, click Next, and then click the Add VI Hierarchy button to display this dialog box.

Use this dialog box to print documentation for all subVIs of a selected VI.

This dialog box includes the following components:

  • Select a VI—Lists all the VIs you have open. This dialog box lists only VIs in the current application instance. If a listed VI is open in multiple application instances, you can print only the current instance. When you select a VI in the list, LabVIEW adds the VI and its subVIs to the Select VIs list in the Print dialog box.
  • Exclude vi.lib VIs—Excludes VIs in labview\vi.lib from the Select VIs list in the Print dialog box.
  • Application instance—Indicates the current application instance.
